verification.payload:
tree 54288d1dd687a67d5198e27b658fc2e45914f0e8
parent b97e3a73498bb49e81039e90e9cb5acdca9123cc
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1585748814 +0200
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1585750739 +0200

test: remove redundant sync_with_ping after add_p2p_connection

files.patch:
@@ -243,10 +243,6 @@ def run_test(self):
         # will occur outside of direct fetching
         test_node = self.nodes[0].add_p2p_connection(BaseNode(), services=NODE_WITNESS)
 
-        # Ensure verack's have been processed by our peer
-        inv_node.sync_with_ping()
-        test_node.sync_with_ping()
-
         self.test_null_locators(test_node, inv_node)
         self.test_nonnull_locators(test_node, inv_node)
